page.title: 13POST HILL (Roman Hill)
page.content: This area lies on the east of the block in the{Cockersdale}countryside park.The park warden hopes that sewage polluting the local beck will soon be diverted and that trout will return, encouraging more than the now rare kingfisher to visit the water. The{Roman}connection comes from a number of coins found nearby in 1910, but no settlement has ever been found. The steep hill is the site of many pursuits.Both official and unofficial motorcycle trials are often held here and children ride their{BMX}bikes and swing from the trees. The area is owned privately by a local firm of building contractors and planning consent has been sought for a dry ski-run and golf driving-range. Hopefully such a major development will not change the character of this very beautiful and quiet country spot.
